name: The Classic T-Shirt
description: The Classic Legal Bunk logo in White or Grey.

name: The China T-Shirt
description:
In ancient China, drug manufacturers didn’t exist.  People didn’t have the option of visiting their local drugstore to purchase a processed remedy for their aches, pains, and various other maladies. What they did have was the earth and the ability to grow plants. So they did. They found the ones that worked for healing and pain alleviation. That’s how the practice of Chinese herbal medicine got started. Fifty herbs were recognized as “fundamental” in ancient Chinese texts and Cannabis was one of those fundamentals.

Modern research seems to suggest they were on to something. While prescription drugs are responsible for about 100,000 deaths annually, there are zero reported cases of death from cannabis usage.  None. In fact, cannabis has been found to provide beneficial results to patients suffering from more than 200 ailments.

name: The Anslinger T-Shirt
description:
Throughout the history of the world, illegitimate people have been placed in power. In some cases these peoples intent and/or incentives have been argued or agreed upon. Hind site is 20/20 which makes it easy to look back and see who had the extreme and exaggerated points of view. What better than a quote(s) to show a person's true incentives.Harry Anslinger, the first Commissioner of the Federal Bereau of Narcotics has a background of malicious quotes aimed directly at the supposed effects of marijuana usage. Anslinger would look past medical proof and attempt to use scenarios to validate his quotes. Victor Licata is a famous example of Anslinger's tactics. Licata was charged and convicted of murdering his family with an axe. Eleven days after this tragic event, an article was release in the Tampa Times  which proved Licata was previously determined as criminally insane. Aside from the psych evaluation, Anslinger insisted that the violence was a result of the usage of marijuana.


Harry J. Anslinger quotes:  
There are 100,000 total marijuana smokers in the US, and most are Negroes, Hispanics, Filipinos and entertainers. Their Satanic music, jazz and swing, result from marijuana usage. This marijuana causes white women to seek sexual relations with Negroes, entertainers and any others.
Harry J. Anslinger quotes:  
Marijuana leads to pacifism and communist brainwashing.
Harry J. Anslinger quotes:  
Reefer makes darkies think they're as good as white men.
Harry J. Anslinger quotes:  
...the primary reason to outlaw marijuana is its effect on the degenerate races.
Harry J. Anslinger quotes:  
Marijuana is the most violence-causing drug in the history of mankind.
Harry J. Anslinger quotes:  
Marijuana is an addictive drug which produces in its users insanity, criminality, and death.
Harry J. Anslinger quotes:  
You smoke a joint and you're likely to kill your brother.

name: The Temperence T-Shirt
description: Early on in the Temperance Movement of the 1890s, those who were for the Prohibition of alcohol suggested using marijuana as a substitute. Why would a group so set on ridding the country of harmful substances be proponents of marijuana usage? From then up until now there has been zero implication that the use of marijuana starts or promotes domestic violence. Alcohol on the other hand...
